slides.title: Freedom Struggle
slides.content:
**Key Events:**
1857: First War of Independence
1885: Indian National Congress
1919: Jallianwala Bagh
1930: Dandi March (Salt Satyagraha)
1942: Quit India Movement
1947: Independence (Aug 15)

**Leaders:** Gandhi, Nehru, Patel, Bose, Tilak

slides.title: Ancient India
slides.content:
**Indus Valley:** Harappa, Mohenjo-daro (3300-1300 BCE)
**Mauryan Empire:** Chandragupta, Ashoka
**Gupta Period:** Golden Age of India
**Mughal Empire:** Babur to Aurangzeb (1526-1707)

question.questionText: In which year did India gain independence?
question.explanation: India gained independence on August 15, 1947, from British rule.
